name: Compass
Simple compass for Sense Hat
info:
Generates a compass, showing north (red) and south (white).

Based on the python example provided with the Sense Hat: https://github.com/RPi-Distro/python-sense-hat/tree/master/examples

The accuracy of the compass will depend on callibrating the Sense Hat
internal compass. Search the Sense Hat forums for a guide on how to
do this.
